Text:
Works like a charm!

I've spent hours trying to find solution because Hypersonic2 worked on my XP and Windows x32 but now on x64 it kept showing me CLED ERROR. 

Thanks man, you saved my ass.
This works wonderful!!! Thanks very much!! Likewise, can u please upload the installer for Grand2, without the content folder? I'm having trouble running the emulator in Windows 7.
It doesn't work for me. I followed the instructions and when I hit the step 6, the application doesn't open and a pop up window appear to "VSTi Player has stopped working". Any suggestions?
